description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Pumpkin Mug Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate Pumpkin Mug Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide mixture between mugs, and mix thoroughly with a spoon to combine, scraping down sides. Microwave each mug for 1 minute 20 seconds or until just cooked.
